job.title: Senior Azure/Python Engineer (Remote)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Senior Software Engineer $130k - $160k 100% Remote 8+ years of software development with a good background using Azure and Python  We are a fast growing cloud based self storage management software and payment processing company. We have been in business for 20+ years and current scaling up our engineering team.  We have been ranked in the Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies for the past several years. We are currently in a major growth phase and hiring a senior software engineer with strong Azure and Python experience.  Top Reasons to Work with Us What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Senior Azure/Python Engineer with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Danny.Herries@Optello.com Danny Herries - Lead Recruiter - Optello  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.  Optello will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring (Ban the Box) Ordinance.
